What was everyone's problem with these movies? They were far batter than the original trilogy...Best of all no constant screams from kirsten dunst. Not to mention they are a lot closer to the comic material.
Blu-ray case came broken in a couple spots, including one of the two spots where the case clasps closed. The discs made it fine, though. And that's what counts.
Go buy the original trilogy.

UV DOES NOT WORK IN THE US! This is a UK copy, and will not work in the US. Do not purchase if you plan to use it for the digital copy.

Redeem code to view digital streaming from any device was not valid in the USA and did not work.  I had to contact ULTRAVIOLET support, who eventually put me into Sony support to have the issue resolved, which it was.  A lot of trouble, but all is well now.
Loved the movies, great price for both.

Good way to have both movies on blu ray. I want the 3d versions as well I guess I'll have to pay more for them. Digital copy does not work in America or anywhere. I've used an app to change my dns with foreign movies and I got them registered and in my ultraviolet and then vudu accounts. Just do it via ultraviolet and even though vudu is only American if your accounts are linked it will appear in your vudu account. Just install dns changer apps. However this movie's digital code did not work with changing my ip/dns to any country/region. It didn't say expired either. It looks like the individual 3d versions of these movies still have unexpired digital xopies.
